title: mac端正版启动器更新时反复重新下载
author: 入教为妮姬
txt_content:
点击启动器图标后弹出updating minecraft窗口，界面显示downloading runtime，但是总是在下载到40多m是开始重新下载已经试过vpn了，但是还是不行
mojang的帮助原文“If you’re a Mac user, this issue can be caused by applications from other sources not being allowed. Make sure to allow applications to be downloaded from anywhere from your System Preferences.”说确保偏好设置里允许从任何地方下载，但是这个我是已经设置过的
